sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Humfrey Beesbury was a [[Knighthood|knight]] of House Beesbury during the reign of [[King of the Andals and the First Men|King]] [[Daeron II Targaryen]].

He challenged his brother-in-law Ser Humfrey Hardyng at the [[Ashford]] [[Tournament|Tourney]], breaking twelve lances in what was considered the best fought battle of the day, that the [[smallfolk]] soon began calling â€œthe Battle of the Humfrey's.â€? However Ser Humfrey Hardyng won the struggle and remained a champion.

Ser Humfrey joined his brother-in-law on the side of Ser [[Duncan the Tall]] in the [[Trial of Seven]]. He was slain by Ser Donnel of [[Duskendale]] in the first pass.
sections.Biography: Humfrey Beesbury fought in the [[Trial by seven of Duncan the Tall]].<ref>"[[Justice of the Seven Kingdoms]]"</ref>
